name: Jungle Healing
effect: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. User and Allies in Range heal 1 HP at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. When activated, cure the user and allies suffering from Status Conditions. They don't need to be on the battlefield to get this effect.
description: The user absorbs energy from nature, empowering it and its allies with nature energy.
